title: synchronym
author: synchronym
content: We went for Eid shopping with some friends and after shopping we went to a restaurant. Sitting there we ordered food then we were having some discussion about our bitcoins. In the meantime, suddenly the owner of the restaurant listens to our words attentively, maybe he was around, we didn't realize. He then shared with us some of his experiences with Bitcoin. He said he invested in bitcoins with some savings from his father and then gradually became successful with bitcoins. Then he opened a restaurant and is now a successful restaurant owner. As well, Bitcoin continues to work. We are all inspired by his success story. We are more interested in Bitcoin, so I shared this with you. What do you think?

I barely even come up with bitcoin discussion, I contribute only when I feel my opinion is needed.

comments.author: Gozie51
comments.body: OP I believe you are more than a month on the forum looking at your activities and you be able to know that the content of your post is not for this board. Please move the thread to bitcoin discussion that better suits it. Meanwhile, it is not always good to discuss your bitcoin investment or earnings to the public. By public that means people you don't know and people you are meeting for the first time. You can become a target or people can start accessing base on the value of bitcoin and probably you were just hyping and fanning your ego

comments.author: Ulven
comments.body: Remember to prioritize your financial security and be cautious about discussing your investment details publicly, as sharing such information can potentially make you a target for scams or unauthorized access. It's generally advisable to maintain discretion when discussing personal financial matters with people you don't know well or in public settings.If you have any specific questions about Bitcoin or any other topic related to cryptocurrencies, You can do that in the dedicated sections. Currently, you are in the gambling section. You can move the topic to the appropriate section.

comments.author: batang_bitcoin
comments.body: First of all OP, you posted on the wrong section. This section is visible and labelled as gambling discussion so you shouldn't post topics like that if it is irrelevant to the board. Secondly, this is like an easy story that can be made up. I am sorry if that's what I am thinking of your story. But if the story tends to be true then I am wrong with my thought. As we go outside, you know that everyone is striving hard to get on their shoes and have a better life. If you're just shopping out and talking loudly about your investments and suddenly a stranger comes out and joins your discussion, it is inappropriate to have that reaction of being too open with the topics you're discussing. What if that guy is just pretending to be the owner of that restaurant where you're eating because anyone can easily claim that? And it turns out that guy had already sighted you hours ago or days ago because you've exposed yourself that you're also into Bitcoin. Please be aware of the dangers of discussing things like this on public because of this very known attack: $5 Wrench Attack
